name: Academy Raider
oracle_text:
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
Whenever Academy Raider deals combat damage to a player, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

name: Accursed Spirit
oracle_text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
flavor_text: Many have heard the slither of dragging armor and the soft squelch of its voice. But only its victims ever meet its icy gaze.

name: Act of Treason
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor_text:
"Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Advocate of the Beast
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on target Beast creature you control.
flavor_text: "I am neither their drover nor their leader. To these majestic beasts, I am simply their herdmate and nothing more."

name: Altar's Reap
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"Don't worry, your death will be as informative as possible."
—Gorghul, augur of skulls

name: Angelic Wall
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
flavor_text:
"The air stirred as if fanned by angels' wings, and the enemy was turned aside."
—Tales of Ikarov the Voyager

name: Archaeomancer
oracle_text: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."

name: Armored Cancrix
flavor_text: Creatures displaced from time still turn up every year, stranded by the temporal disaster that once swept across Dominaria.

name: Auramancer
oracle_text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

name: Blood Bairn
oracle_text: Sacrifice another creature: Blood Bairn gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The travelers were warned to watch out for children on the road.

name: Blur Sliver
oracle_text: Sliver creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)
flavor_text: They move in a synchronized swarm, turning entire squads into heaps of bloody rags and bones in an instant.

name: Brindle Boar
oracle_text: Sacrifice Brindle Boar: You gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"Tell the cooks to prepare the fires. Tonight we feast!"
—Tolar Wolfbrother, Krosan tracker

name: Cancel
oracle_text: Counter target spell.

name: Canyon Minotaur
flavor_text:
"We'll scale these cliffs, traverse Brittle Bridge, and then fight our way down the volcanic slopes on the other side."
"Isn't the shortest route through the canyon?"
"Yes."
"So shouldn't we—"
"No."

name: Capashen Knight
oracle_text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
{1}{W}: Capashen Knight gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: He protects Benalia as much with his reputation as with his force of arms.

name: Celestial Flare
oracle_text: Target player sacrifices an attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text:
"You were defeated the moment you declared your aggression."
—Gideon Jura

name: Chandra's Outrage
oracle_text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."

name: Charging Griffin
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Charging Griffin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Four claws, two wings, one beak, no fear.

name: Child of Night
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

name: Claustrophobia
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

name: Coral Merfolk
flavor_text: Early sailors thought they were tricks of the mind or perhaps manatees. As more and more ships were classified as lost to "manatee attacks," the truth began to dawn.

name: Corpse Hauler
oracle_text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice Corpse Hauler: Return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"He expects a reward, but the only piece of silver he'll get from me is my blade in his gut."
—Shelac, necromancer

name: Cyclops Tyrant
oracle_text:
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
Cyclops Tyrant can't block creatures with power 2 or less.
flavor_text: A single eye, blinded by rage.

name: Dark Favor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Dark Favor enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.
flavor_text: When he began to curse what he held holy, his strength grew unrivaled.

name: Dawnstrike Paladin
oracle_text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: She crushes darkness beneath her charger's hooves.

name: Deadly Recluse
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Even dragons fear its silken strands.

name: Deathgaze Cockatrice
oracle_text:
Flying
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text:
"Sometimes I come across a stone finger or foot and I know I'm in cockatrice territory."
—Rulak, bog guide

name: Demolish
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land.
flavor_text:
"This is why I hate settlements. They lull you into a false sense of security."
—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

name: Disperse
oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Gryffid found his way home and resumed life as best he could, constantly hiding his newfound fear of clouds.

name: Divination
oracle_text: Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you."
—Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

name: Divine Favor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Divine Favor enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
flavor_text: With an armory of light, even the squire may champion her people.

name: Dragon Hatchling
oracle_text:
Flying
{R}: Dragon Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Those dragons grow fast. For a while they feed on squirrels and goblins and then suddenly you're missing a mammoth."
—Hurdek, Mazar mammoth trainer

name: Duress
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text:
"It hurts more if you think about it."
—Hooks, Cabal torturer

name: Elvish Mystic
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text:
"Life grows everywhere. My kin merely find those places where it grows strongest."
—Nissa Revane

name: Essence Scatter
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.
flavor_text:
"What you attempt to pull from the Æther, I can spread onto the wind."
—Jace Beleren

name: Festering Newt
oracle_text: When Festering Newt dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn. That creature gets -4/-4 instead if you control a creature named Bogbrew Witch.
flavor_text: Its back bubbles like a witch's cauldron, and it smells just as vile.

name: Fog
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text:
"I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else."
—Lord Hilneth

name: Fortify
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
• Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Where metal is tainted and wood is scarce, we are best armed by faith."
—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

name: Frost Breath
oracle_text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: "I'll make ice chimes of your bones."

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Giant Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"It has a quickness about it that seems unnatural for its large size, yet its hunger is about right."
—Endril, Kalonian naturalist

name: Gladecover Scout
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: "The forest is my cover and I hold it close. In such a tight embrace, there is no room for wickedness."

name: Goblin Shortcutter
oracle_text: When Goblin Shortcutter enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: "I'm not running away! I'm figuring out the best routes."

name: Griffin Sentinel
oracle_text:
Flying
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text: Once a griffin sentinel adopts a territory as its own, only death can force it to betray its post.

name: Groundshaker Sliver
oracle_text: Sliver creatures you control have trample. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

name: Hive Stirrings
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 colorless Sliver creature tokens.
flavor_text: Sliver young are sorted into clutches according to their potential and their future role. Human scholars can only guess how those are determined.

name: Hunt the Weak
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: He who hesitates is lunch.

name: Lava Axe
oracle_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: A strict upgrade over the cinder hatchet.

name: Lay of the Land
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Victory favors neither the righteous nor the wicked. It favors the prepared.

name: Lightning Talons
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"The victim was either clawed to death or struck by lightning. Possibly both."
—Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

name: Liturgy of Blood
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text:
"You harbor such vast potential. It would be such a shame to let you die of old age."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord

name: Marauding Maulhorn
oracle_text: Marauding Maulhorn attacks each combat if able unless you control a creature named Advocate of the Beast.
flavor_text:
"It's not just you. Everyone makes it angry."
—Ardenoth, elvish nature advocate

name: Mark of the Vampire
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.
flavor_text:
"My 'condition' is a trial. The weak are consumed by it. The strong transcend it."
—Sorin Markov

name: Master of Diversion
oracle_text: Whenever Master of Diversion attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
flavor_text: Choose your battles carefully. For example, avoid the big guy.

name: Merfolk Spy
oracle_text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Whenever Merfolk Spy deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals a card at random from their hand.

name: Messenger Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
When Messenger Drake dies, draw a card.
flavor_text: The more important the message, the larger the messenger.

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text:
"What a pity. You should have written it down."
—Liliana Vess

name: Minotaur Abomination
flavor_text:
"Look at that. Shuffling, wobbling, entrails placed haphazardly. It's shameful. Who would let that kind of work flap about for all to see?"
—Lestin, necromancer

name: Naturalize
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"When your cities and trinkets crumble, only nature will remain."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

name: Nephalia Seakite
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
flavor_text:
"Keep one eye on the cliff road or you may fall to your death. Keep one eye on the sky or your death may fall on you."
—Manfried Ulmach, Elgaud Master-at-Arms

name: Nightwing Shade
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}{B}: Nightwing Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"There is one hour of the night even we do not watch."
—Sedva, captain of the watch

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

name: Pay No Heed
oracle_text: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.
flavor_text:
"Out of this nettle, danger, we pluck this flower, safety."
—William Shakespeare,
*King Henry IV, Part I*

name: Pillarfield Ox
flavor_text:
"You old, immobile clod! If I could stuff your doltish head with knowledge, I'd do it just so someone else could fully comprehend what your stubbornness has cost me!"
—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

name: Pitchburn Devils
oracle_text: When Pitchburn Devils dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The ingenuity of goblins, the depravity of demons, and the smarts of sheep.

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Let nothing own the skies but the wind."
—Dejara, Giltwood druid

name: Predatory Sliver
oracle_text: Sliver creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text: No matter how much the slivers change, their collective might remains.

name: Quag Sickness
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each Swamp you control.
flavor_text: The dread gases didn't kill Farbid. But as he lay in the muck, miserable and helpless, watching ghouls and rats advance on him, he wished they had.

name: Ranger's Guile
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"You don't survive in the wild by standing in plain sight."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Regathan Firecat
flavor_text: It stalks the Regathan highlands, leaving behind melted snow, scorched earth, and the charred corpses of would-be temple robbers.

name: Rootwalla
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: They make terrible pets . . . unless you don't like your other pets.

name: Rumbling Baloth
flavor_text: In the dim light beneath the vast trees of Deepglade, baloths prowl in search of prey. Their guttural calls are more felt than heard, but their attack scream carries for miles.

name: Scroll Thief
oracle_text: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor_text: Kapsho merfolk have infiltrated fortresses as remote as the desert citadel in Sunari in their relentless quest for arcane knowledge.

name: Seacoast Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Seacoast drakes have been known to follow ships for hundreds of miles, waiting to snap up garbage, bait, and the occasional sailor.

name: Seismic Stomp
oracle_text: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"It is not in me to tread lightly."
—Ryda, geomancer

name: Sensory Deprivation
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
flavor_text: They call it "stitcher's anesthesia," a spell to deaden the senses while the mad doctors begin their grisly work.

name: Sentinel Sliver
oracle_text: Sliver creatures you control have vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)
flavor_text: Through its watchful gaze, all slivers may see.

name: Shadowborn Apostle
oracle_text:
A deck can have any number of cards named Shadowborn Apostle.
{B}, Sacrifice six creatures named Shadowborn Apostle: Search your library for a Demon creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

name: Shock
oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

name: Show of Valor
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Cowards watch. Heroes act.

name: Shrivel
oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Do not weep for the frail. Their time couldn't have been that far off."
—Nathrac, plaguesower

name: Siege Mastodon
flavor_text:
"The walls of the wicked will fall before us. Ready the siege engines. We proceed to war!"
—General Avitora

name: Sliver Construct
flavor_text: Slivers destroy those who come close to the Skep, the central hive. Shards of torn metal litter the ground as a warning to any artificers inquisitive about the hive's inner workings.

name: Smelt
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text:
"Looks like that wasn't darksteel after all."
—Koth of the Hammer

name: Solemn Offering
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"You will be reimbursed for your donation.""The reimbursement is spiritual."
—Temple signs

name: Soulmender
oracle_text: {T}: You gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "Healing is more art than magic. Well, there is still quite a bit of magic."

name: Sporemound
oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text:
"If you threaten its territory, it produces spores. Actually, no matter what you do, it produces spores."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

name: Striking Sliver
oracle_text: Sliver creatures you control have first strike. (They deal combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: You're too busy recoiling in fear to realize that it's already hit you.

name: Suntail Hawk
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"They are the finest companions in the realm. Swift, clever, and easily trained to hunt intruders."
—Almira, falconer

name: Thunder Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: Lightning reflexes, thunderous might.

name: Time Ebb
oracle_text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"Yesterday you were just a figment of your master's imagination. I liked you better then."
—Shai Fusan, archmage

name: Tome Scour
oracle_text: Target player mills five cards.
flavor_text: "I hope none of those were important!"

name: Trained Condor
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Trained Condor attacks, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"They're smart enough to understand that war means lots of carrion."
—Griv, condor rider

name: Trollhide
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}{G}: Regenerate this creature." (The next time the creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

name: Undead Minotaur
flavor_text:
"The work that went into creating this magnificent specimen. Horrific, deadly, well-balanced. Not all necromancers do elegant work like this."
—Lestin, necromancer

name: Verdant Haven
oracle_text:
Enchant land
When Verdant Haven enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

name: Vile Rebirth
oracle_text: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor_text: Grave robbers digging down cautiously listen for anything digging up.

name: Wild Guess
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: No guts, no glory.

name: Wring Flesh
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"You shouldn't be so attached to something as fragile as flesh."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord

name: Zephyr Charge
oracle_text: {1}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"All armies prefer high ground to low and sunny places to dark."
—Sun Tzu, *Art of War*, trans. Giles
